alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Muskogee (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 08 at 9:29AM CDT until June 08 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 AM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL MAYES...EASTERN WAGONER...CENTRAL CHEROKEE AND NORTHEASTERN MUSKOGEE COUNTIES... At 929 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Locust Grove to 4 miles north of Hulbert to 3 miles southeast of Sequoyah State Park to 3 miles northwest of Muskogee, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Muskogee... Tahlequah... Wagoner... Fort Gibson... Okay... Hulbert... Tullahassee... Peggs... Sequoyah State Park... Lost City... Murphy... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
